title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repository: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama, published on PyPI as ‘ollama’.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama, published on npm as ‘ollama’.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package (PyPI: langchain-ollama) allowing Ollama models as LLM backends.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (ChatGPT-style interface) built with SvelteKit.

title: ollama-redis
summary: Redis vector-store integration for Ollama embeddings, enabling RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-chatbot-ui
summary: Next.js chatbot UI that talks to local Ollama models via REST API.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Enhanced interactive CLI for Ollama with conversation history and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models as GitHub-Copilot alternative.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG example using Ollama embeddings and LlamaIndex for PDF Q&A.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that answers questions using local Ollama models.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration (PyPI: ollama-haystack) exposing Ollama as Generator & Embedder.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack Bolt app that threads replies powered by Ollama models.

title: ollama-n8n-node
summary: Community n8n node to call Ollama models inside automation workflows.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat app template that connects to Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin for AI-assisted writing using local Ollama models.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Unofficial Rust crate (crates.io: ollama) providing typed REST client.

title: ollama-django
summary: Django app + REST wrapper around Ollama for model hosting inside Django projects.

title: ollama-macos-menu
summary: Swift menubar app for macOS that starts/stops Ollama and shows model status.
